name: T - Carson 2
condition: unit2.nid == 'Carson' and v('nicole_talk') == 2 and not v('night')
_source: speak;Emma; Hey Carson, did you ever find that treat for Nicole?
speak;Carson; Oh, well, yes, but she laid down for a nap before I could give it to her.{w} Although, she's been having some{tgm}...{tgm} trouble with sleeping.
speak;Emma; What do you mean by that?
speak;Emma; Is everything okay?{w} She and I talked earlier, and something didn't seem quite right.

speak;Carson; Some days are better than others, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} She keeps having recurring nightmares about her childhood.{w} She won't tell me what they're about, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} she talks in her sleep and I can piece it together.
speak;Emma; I don't usually like to pry, but{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Could you tell me what's troubling her dreams?

speak;Carson; Something about an accident with her mother, I think.{w} Some nights she's quiet as a mouse,{w} but others, I've caught her screaming,{w} walking, and wildly waving her staves around in her sleep.
speak;Emma; I don't know what I'd do if I woke up to Emily waving her bow around.
speak;Carson; We take it one night at a time,{w} and I don't pressure her to tell me anything she doesn't want to.
speak;Carson; Seeing her in pain does hurt, though.
speak;Emma; Is there anything I can do to help out?
speak;Carson; No, I don't think so.{w} This is more something between the two of us.
speak;Carson; Emma, would you mind giving us a moment?{w} I may have to calm her down before dinner.
speak;Carson; Shh, just rest.{w} It's all okay now{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Oh, Nicole...you seem so nice.{w} You deserve so much better.;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
